# About Me

I'm a Research Assistant at the Lahore University of Management Sciences.

My goal is to be contribute towards democratizing and building efficient Machine Learning systems that empower underrepresented populations, and continuously improve upon existing technologies.

Some of my interests include (but are not limited to)

- **Efficient ML**: Quantization, Pruning, Distillation, Neural Architecture Search, Parameter-Efficient Finetuning, TinyML

- **Multimodal Representation Learning**: Visual Language Models, Diffusion Models, Text-to-Speech/Speech-to-Text Models

- **Natural Language Processing**: LLMs for Code Understanding and Rewriting, LLM Agents, Multilingual NLP, NLP for underrepresented populations

- **Miscellaneous**: Mixture of Experts, Model Merging, Parallel Computing, Open-Source Software, Automatic Differentiation Engines, Optimization

You can find a lot more details about my projects, relevant experiences (industry, research, and teaching), and activities outside academia in my [CV](static/cv.pdf).
